data.persona: I am a scientist in the kingdom. I have discovered various elements. I am very, very smart.
data.description:
You are in the Dry Dock Room.
The room is located on the border wall of the aquapolis. There is one on the far north and far south side.
There's some scuba gear, a door, a rock, and a dry dock here.
A property owner is here.

You are carrying a flask, and wearing some glasses and a long coat.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the property owner a flask of wine
data.mid_motivation: I want the property owner to invite me to his property today
data.long_motivation: I want the property owner to become my patron and sponsor my research

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wear glasses and a long coat.
